1    | /*****
2    |  ** ** Module Header ******************************************************* **
3    |  ** 									     **
4    |  **   Modules Revision 3.0						     **
5    |  **   Providing a flexible user environment				     **
6    |  ** 									     **
7    |  **   File:		cmdWhatis.c					     **
8    |  **   First Edition:	1995/12/31					     **
9    |  ** 									     **
10   |  **   Authors:	Jens Hamisch, jens@Strawberry.COM			     **
11   |  **		R.K. Owen, <rk@owen.sj.ca.us> or <rkowen@nersc.gov>	     **
12   |  ** 									     **
13   |  **   Description:	The Tcl module-verbose routine allows switchin ver-  **
14   |  **			bosity on and off during module file execution	     **
15   |  ** 									     **
16   |  **   Exports:		cmdModuleWhatis					     **
17   |  **			cmdModuleWhatisInit				     **
18   |  **			cmdModuleWhatisShut				     **
19   |  ** 									     **
20   |  **   Notes:								     **

32   | static char Id[] = "@(#)$Id: cmdWhatis.c.src.html,v 1.8 2009/09/01 20:22:33 rkowen Exp $";
33   | static void *UseId[] = { &UseId, Id };
34   | 
35   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
36   | /** 				      HEADERS				     **/
37   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
38   | 
39   | #include "modules_def.h"
40   | 
41   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
42   | /** 				  LOCAL DATATYPES			     **/
43   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
44   | 
45   | /** not applicable **/
46   | 
47   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
48   | /** 				     CONSTANTS				     **/
49   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
50   | 
51   | #define	WHATIS_FRAG 100
52   | 
53   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
54   | /**				      MACROS				     **/
55   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
56   | 
57   | /** not applicable **/
58   | 
59   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
60   | /** 				    LOCAL DATA				     **/
61   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
62   | 
63   | static	char	module_name[] = __FILE__;
64   | 
65   | /**
66   |  **  The whatis array ...
67   |  **/
68   | 
69   | char		**whatis = (char **) NULL;
70   | static	int	  whatis_size = 0, whatis_ndx = 0;
71   | 
72   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
73   | /**				    PROTOTYPES				     **/
74   | /** ************************************************************************ **/
75   | 
76   | /** not applicable **/
77   | 
78   | 
79   | /*++++
80   |  ** ** Function-Header ***************************************************** **
81   |  ** 									     **
82   |  **   Function:		cmdModuleWhatis					     **
83   |  ** 									     **
84   |  **   Description:	Callback function for 'verbose'			     **
85   |  ** 									     **
86   |  **   First Edition:	1995/12/31					     **
87   |  ** 									     **
88   |  **   Parameters:	ClientData	 client_data			     **
89   |  **			Tcl_Interp	*interp		According Tcl interp.**
90   |  **			int		 objc		Number of arguments  **
91   |  **			Tcl_Obj		*objv[]		Argument array	     **
92   |  ** 									     **
93   |  **   Result:		int	TCL_OK		Successful completion	     **
94   |  **				TCL_ERROR	Any error		     **
95   |  ** 									     **
96   |  **   Attached Globals:	sw_verbose	The verbose level selector	     **
97   |  **   			g_flags		These are set up accordingly before  **
98   |  **					this function is called in order to  **
99   |  **					control everything		     **
100  |  ** 									     **
101  |  ** ************************************************************************ **
102  |  ++++*/
103  | 
104  | int cmdModuleWhatis(
105  | 	ClientData client_data,
106  | 	Tcl_Interp * interp,
107  | 	int objc,
108  | 	Tcl_Obj * CONST84 objv[]
109  | ) {
110  | 	int             i = 1;
111  | 
112  |     /**
113  |      **  Help mode
114  |      **/
115  | 	if (g_flags & M_HELP)
116  | 		return (TCL_OK);	/** -------- EXIT (SUCCESS) -------> **/
117  |     /**
118  |      **  Parameter check
119  |      **/
120  | 	if (objc < 2) {
121  | 		if (OK !=
122  | 		    ErrorLogger(ERR_USAGE, LOC, Tcl_GetString(objv[0]),
123  | 				" string", NULL))
124  | 			return (TCL_ERROR);
125  | 					/** -------- EXIT (FAILURE) -------> **/
126  | 	}
127  |     /**
128  |      **  If we don't have any whatis list buffer until now, we will create one
129  |      **/
130  | 	if (!whatis) {
131  | 		whatis_size = WHATIS_FRAG;
132  | 		if ((char **)NULL
133  | 		    == (whatis = module_malloc(whatis_size * sizeof(char *)))) {
134  | 			ErrorLogger(ERR_ALLOC, LOC, NULL);
135  | 			return (TCL_ERROR);
136  | 					/** -------- EXIT (FAILURE) -------> **/
137  | 		}
138  | 	}
139  |     /**
140  |      **  Display mode?
141  |      **/
142  | 	if (g_flags & M_DISPLAY) {
143  | 		fprintf(stderr, "%s\t ", Tcl_GetString(objv[0]));
144  | 		for (i = 1; i < objc; i++)
145  | 			fprintf(stderr, "%s ", Tcl_GetString(objv[i]));
146  | 		fprintf(stderr, "\n");
147  | 		return (TCL_OK);	/** ------- EXIT PROCEDURE -------> **/
148  | 	}
149  |     /**
150  |      **  Check if printing is requested 
151  |      **/
152  | 	if (g_flags & M_WHATIS) {
153  | 		while (i < objc) {
154  | 	    /**
155  | 	     **  Conditionally we have to enlarge our buffer
156  | 	     **/
157  | 			while (whatis_ndx + 2 >= whatis_size) {
158  | 				whatis_size += WHATIS_FRAG;
159  | 				if ((char **)NULL ==
160  | 				    (whatis = module_realloc(whatis,
161  | 					     whatis_size * sizeof(char *)))) {
162  | 					ErrorLogger(ERR_ALLOC, LOC, NULL);
163  | 					return (TCL_ERROR);
164  | 					/** -------- EXIT (FAILURE) -------> **/
165  | 				}
166  | 			}
167  | 
168  | 	    /**
169  | 	     **  Put the string on the buffer
170  | 	     **/
171  | 
172  | 			if ((char *)NULL == (whatis[whatis_ndx++]
173  | 			= stringer(NULL, 0, Tcl_GetString(objv[i++]), NULL))) {
174  | 				if (OK != ErrorLogger(ERR_ALLOC, LOC, NULL))
175  | 					return (TCL_ERROR);
176  | 				whatis_ndx--;
177  | 			}
178  | 		} /** while **/
179  | 	} /** if **/
180  |     /**
181  |      **  Put a trailing terminator on the buffer
182  |      **/
183  | 	whatis[whatis_ndx] = (char *)NULL;
184  | 
185  | 	return (TCL_OK);
186  | 
187  | } /** End of 'cmdModuleWhatis' **/
188  |    
189  | /*++++
190  |  ** ** Function-Header ***************************************************** **
191  |  ** 									     **
192  |  **   Function:		cmdModuleWhatisInit				     **
193  |  **			cmdModuleWhatisShut				     **
194  |  ** 									     **
195  |  **   Description:	Initialization of internat data structures for the   **
196  |  **			Module whatis command				     **
197  |  ** 									     **
198  |  **   First Edition:	1995/12/31					     **
199  |  ** 									     **
200  |  **   Parameters:	-						     **
201  |  ** 									     **
202  |  **   Result:		-						     **
203  |  ** 									     **
204  |  ** ************************************************************************ **
205  |  ++++*/
206  | 
207  | void	cmdModuleWhatisInit()
208  | {
209  |     whatis_ndx = 0;
210  | 
211  | } /** End of 'cmdModuleWhatisInit' **/
212  | 
213  | void	cmdModuleWhatisShut()
214  | {
215  |     char **ptr = whatis;
216  | 
217  |     if( whatis) {
218  | 	while(*ptr) {		/** go until NULL token **/
219  | 	    null_free((void *) ptr);
220  | 	    ptr++;
221  | 	}
222  | 	whatis_ndx = 0;
223  |     }
224  | 
225  | } /** End of 'cmdModuleWhatisShut' **/
